title: List of all Android material icons  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android material icons  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: MaterialChipsInputDemo
repoList.description: Using the new material library from google to implement Chips just like the Gmail app. Using commas to generate new chips from EditText inside ChipGroup and deleting them on close icon click or backspace press from soft keypad.

repoList.name: mdi-android
repoList.description: Android library that provides the latest Material Design Icons (@templarian/MaterialDesign)

repoList.name: MaterialContactIcon
repoList.description: Library that allows the creation of material contact icons.

repoList.name: DemoProject
repoList.description: This is an Android Library for showing Material Dialog with little customization with icons, colors, divider line.  Example is available in app module.
